testcase.classname: User should be able to reserve a car
testcase.name: User should be able to reserve a car as customer service profile
testcase.system-out: When user login the page....................................................passed Given user is on the home page..............................................passed And select a car............................................................passed And enter pick up field.....................................................passed And enter drop off field....................................................passed And click continue reservation..............................................passed And verify complete reservation screen pops up..............................passed And enter card number.......................................................passed And enter name on the card..................................................passed And enter expire date and CVC...............................................passed And checks the agreement....................................................passed And click complete reservation..............................................passed Then verify ‘Reservation created successfully’ pop up.......................passed And navigated to Reservations screen........................................passed And verify the last reservation is created..................................passed When you click on the last reservation......................................passed Then verify reservation detail page is displayed............................passed And verify the table has the following fields: Model, Doors, Seats, Luggage, Transmission, Air Conditioning, Fuel Type, Age.passed And click on bath to reservations...........................................passed And verify Reservations page is displayed...................................passed And click on Home link......................................................passed Then verify the home page is displayed......................................passed
